input.sentences: the christmas decorations are the best part of the holiday .
each street is filled with them .
it gets me in the spirit just seeing them .
the fashion along with them are so amazing .
the horses were the best part .
output.sentences: This holiday season, we decided to set decorations for a Christmas party
As the street was filled with blankets of snow.
Which gave us a boost of holiday spirit.
My cousin, who is a fashion designer, made us amazing Christmas party dresses for us.
As we were setting up, we heard singing outside and it was Christmas carolers with horses sled
